    String path="jdbc:derby://localhost:1527/sanjeev ";
    String name="sanjeev";
    String pass="sanjeev27";
    private void jButton1ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         

        try
        {
            Connection con=DriverManager.getConnection(path,name,pass);
            Statement st=con.createStatement();
            String str="select *from LOGINMASTER where USERNAME='"+txtName.getText()+"' and PASSWORD='"+txtPass.getText()+"' ";
            ResultSet rs=st.executeQuery("select * from SANJEEV.LOGINMASTER" );
            if(rs.next())
            {
                JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"Login Successfully");
                HomeMaster fh=new HomeMaster();
                fh.show();
                this.hide();

            }else
            {
                JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"Invalid Login");
                txtName.setText("");
                txtPass.setText("");
            }

        }
        catch(Exception e)
        {
            System.out.println("error"+e);
        }

        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }                                        

    private void jButton2ActionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {                                         
        this.dispose();
        // TODO add your handling code here:
    }
